_Virudhagiri_ (qv) is a 2010 Indian Tamil action film written and directed by Vijayakanth, making his directorial debut, besides playing the title character as well.[1] The film, co-starring Madhuri Itagi, Arun Pandian and Mansoor Ali Khan among others, released on 10 December 2010. The film is a remake of the English movie Taken.::Ramesh Urmilanshu
